reviewText:
When Yeyo comes marching home he finds his wife naked in
their bed with another man.  Yeyo's war instincts take over
and he kills them both.  He flees to his brother, who thought
Yeyo had been killed in the war but the police track i down.
In the fight that ensues, Yeyo's brother is accidentally killed.
Yeyo is enraged and becomes a vicious cop-killer in this
fast-paced high-action chase thriller. You'll be on the edge of
your seat until the final scene...is it an escape or a trap?
